titleStmt.title: A ryght pleasaunt and merye historie, of the mylner of Abyngton, with his wife, and his fayre daughter: and of two poore scholers of Cambridge Wherevnto is adioyned another merye Iest, of a sargeaunt that woulde haue learned to be a fryar.
titleStmt.author: Boorde, Andrew, 1490?-1549, attributed name.
More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535. Mery gest how a sergeau[n]t woldel erne [sic] to be a frere.

notesStmt.note: The second part is by Sir Thomas More. Mery gest how a sergeau[n]t woldel erne [sic] to be a frere (STC 18091)--STC.
Actual printer's name and date of publication suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
